mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_REMOULD_R_SOURCE_Other (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
record_no ,
ass_card_no ,
source_id ,
change_price ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{record_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{change_price,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, record_no, ass_card_no, source_id, change_price, note FROM ass_remould_r_source_Other WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and record_no = #{record_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and source_id = #{source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.ass_card_no, a.source_id, a.change_price, b.source_name FROM ASS_REMOULD_R_SOURCE_Other a left join hos_source b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.source_id = b.source_id WHERE a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.record_no = #{record_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.record_no, a.ass_card_no, a.source_id, a.change_price, a.note, b.source_code||' '||b.source_name source_name from ass_remould_r_source_Other a left join hos_source b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.source_id = b.source_id where a.group_id = #{group_id} and a.hos_id = #{hos_id} and a.copy_code = #{copy_code} and a.record_no = #{record_no} and a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}
